application.doc: Retrieving detailed traffic records for a specific Junction or User-Agent on a Reverse Proxy instance

param.name: instance
param.doc: The name of the Reverse Proxy instance to retrieve records for.

param.name: aspect
param.doc: The aspect to group the retrieved records for. Valid values are "junction" or "useragent".

param.name: aspect_identifier
param.doc: The junction or user-agent identifier to retrieve records for. See the topic "Retrieving a summary of traffic for a Reverse Proxy instance using the web service" for how to retrieve these values.

param.name: date
param.doc: The starting time, represented as a UNIX time stamp.

param.name: duration
param.doc: The duration of records from the starting time to retrieve, in seconds. (For example, 86400 for one day)

method.name: GET
method.id: Retrieving detailed traffic records for a specific Junction or User-Agent on a Reverse Proxy instance
method.doc: To retrieve detailed traffic records for a specific junction or User-Agent on a Reverse Proxy instance using the web service, issue an HTTP GET command on the resource URI.

request.doc:
Example 1: Summary of traffic for junction "mobile.ibm.com" (junction with aspect identifier of 1) GET https://{appliance_hostname}/analysis/reverse_proxy_traffic/traffic/instance/default/junction/1/?date=1390190400&duration=86400
Example 2: Summary of traffic for user-agent "ANDROID" (useragent with aspect identifier of 1) GET https://{appliance_hostname}/analysis/reverse_proxy_traffic/traffic/instance/default/useragent/1/?date=1390280400&duration=86400

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

representation.name: FlowdataOverview
representation.doc: Note: Response body is an array.

param.name: a
param.doc: The label for this item. (Junction name if using the "junction" aspect, or aggregated useragent string if using the "useragent" aspect.

param.name: b
param.doc: The interval of the records, in seconds. (For example, 600 for ten minutes, 86400 for 24 hours)

param.name: h
param.doc: The total number of recorded hits during the interval records were requested for.

param.name: i
param.doc: The numerical identifier for this Junction or Useragent. This can be used in subsequent requests to retrieve detailed records.

param.name: t
param.doc: The time of the first recorded events for this item.
